headline.print_headline: Fans Online and, Perhaps, at Bookstores
headline.main: ‘Galactic Hot Dogs’ Hopes Readers on Funbrain Will Buy at Bookstores

snippet: Max Brallier’s “Galactic Hot Dogs” has taken off on the gaming website for children, leading to a seven-figure, three-book deal with Aladdin, an imprint of Simon & Schuster Children’s Publishing.
abstract: Simon & Schuster purchases book Galactic Hot Dogs by children's writer Max Brallier in seven-figure, three-book deal because novel is hit on popular children's gaming website Funbrain.com; deal illustrates how Funbrain.com and sister site Poptropica have become incubators for some of biggest blockbusters in children's book publishing, prompting major publishers to see them as source of new talent and marketing platform.
